website_summaries.verdict: The best all around keychain breathalyzer that is small, portable, and more accurate than other options.
pros: High-quality sensor works to produce an accurate read time and time again
Breathalyzer syncs up to iPhone and Android phones for detailed information instantly
cons: Breathalyzer requires 20 minutes after the last drink for best results

customer_reviews.title: Completely Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Total junk. My wife drank a half a bottle of wine and it registered a zero BAC. I had 2 sips of wine and it registered later .14 BAC.
customer_reviews.author: UpNorthWoods

customer_reviews.title: Consistently tracks BAC
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I'm a breastfeeding mom, and when I drink alcohol I want to be sure it's totally out of my system before breastfeeding. I love that with the app, I not only find out my current BAC, but also get an estimate of when my system will be alcohol-free if not already. I have tried testing repeatedly over time, and the estimate is usually very close to accurate. Great tool, works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Fails at its only function
customer_reviews.text: The product seems really well made and feels high quality. However the readings are absolutely all over the place. I tested it out after having about four drinks over two hours. Readings were anywhere between .06 and .15. Absolutely useless for its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Michael LeGuy

customer_reviews.title: Seriously. $25+ Better safe than sorry vs' $2500++++
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Runs about a .1 off of the more expensive BACtrack units. Great for those nights when you think you need to check. Trust me $6 to $$0 for Uber or Lyfttis better than the $6000 plus for a DWI.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZONAL

customer_reviews.title: Readings are worthless, all over the place.
customer_reviews.text: I tried it in various scenarios, but I cannot rely on this piece of crap when drinking. I took a shot, and then blew - the reading was very high. A couple of minutes later, the reading was 0. My friend drank solidly all evening - his reading was 0. On another night, I was getting readings between 0.02 and 0.06, minutes apart (with no drinking in between the readings). The numbers didn't necessarily go in one direction (up or down), they were wildly oscillating, all over the place. I couldn't consider it trustworthy enough to measure the level of alcohol in one's body, even for a very approximate reading. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Vidrascu

customer_reviews.title: Plastic keychain connection broke, then the device reported incorrect, low results.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this device for six months. It seemed to be working well, until the small, plastic loop which enables the attaching to your keyring broke. Then one week later, I noticed the amount of blowing time required to get a reading decreased significantly, resulting in incorrect low readings. I confirmed this by blowing into this device and then the BACtrack S80 pro which I also have.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Francis Daly

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: It isn't very accurate. It's about .02 off. I have a breathalyzer in my car and I blew into this and it came up all zeros but when I blew in my car it was reading .019. It would be okay if you want to know about what your bac is.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna E.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been amazingly handy, living in a place with zero tolerance for driving while intoxicated, people were getting DUIs even after a full night's rest post drinking. Hence why I purchased this, to ensure I was never driving with any alcohol in my system and this has already paid well for itself in giving me reassurance before I start the car that when I pass through 2 DUI checkpoints just getting to work I have nothing to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: JD_Justice

customer_reviews.title: Cool little machine.
customer_reviews.text: I have no way of testing it for accuracy but it seems like it works and I certainly hope I never find out for sure that it doesn't. I'm pretty sure that you're supposed to wait until at least 20 minutes after you've taken a drink before you blow into pretty most BAC machines or you won't get an accurate reading. So if some people are getting readings that they know can't be right then that might be why, don't drink anything for 20 minutes then try blowing into it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, Accurate and oh....Very Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Small, easy to use, well made and most of all ACCURATE. Your research has ended...this is the one you want.
customer_reviews.author: R12

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine now for several months, it seems to be very accurate and consistent as long as you follow the instructions. ( you cant use it right after having a drink, you have to wait a few mins and rinsing our mouth with water before using helps get a more accurate reading. I love mine and use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Maybe mine is defective?
customer_reviews.text: So, I got this little device since I'm new to drinking and I didn't want to press my luck and drink more than I realized. But, I think my device must be defective. It always shows 0.000, even if I take a sample 20 minutes after drinking. I tested it 20 seconds after drinking, and it registers something higher than 0, but the instructions say to wait 20 minutes, and that always shows 0. So, I'm thinking maybe my device is defective and it isn't as sensitive as it's supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Careful not to underestimate
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two BACtrack devices. BACtrack Go $39 with MicroSense BACtrack's own technology. BACtrack C6 $59.99 with BluFire (what police use) I compared both with an app the shows a BAC metabolizing rate of 0.015 per hour. I charted all three together. In all eight (8) over a six-hour period measurements from the C6 underestimated by about .035. The cheaper lessor technology won. The BACtrack GO tracked closer to the app. I realize there are a lot of influences that affect readings. but I would rather overestimate than underestimate. And in 8 of 8 readings the C6 were roughly half found in the app and on the BACtrack GO. I don't want to risk $12,000 on a DUI.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Munson

customer_reviews.title: Fun product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fun an inexpensive. I wish I had something to compair it to as far as accuracy goes but over all I think it is pretty accurate from what I can tell. It fits perfectly in your pocket for when your going out for the night.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works well!  Love the app!
customer_reviews.text: While I know you can’t use this as an “official” indicator of your BAC I am glad I have it. I will use this for after client dinners when I need to head to the nearby hotel. I am typically just fine because I have a beer or two over a course of several hours but I love the piece of mind this gives me. Still works great after all this time and I love the app too. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Groom

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Accurate, easy to use interface. A+
customer_reviews.text: Have been subjected to police breathalyzers before, and know my legal limit / when I’m right on the edge of .08 Blood Alcohol limit(4 IPA beers). Tested this product after one beer and waiting 15-20 mins; .018, after two beers- .039 , etc. It is literally spot on. Gives you the ability to track your testings and readings to show others. Can’t say enough about it!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Bednarz

customer_reviews.title: The best keychain that you will ever blow into
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a BACtrack for years, but the C6 keychain is even better! It's smaller and I can use it with or without my phone. My old one needed the app (which is still cool because it tells you when you will be sober). Get this one. Get the older version. Just spend the money and don't buy one of those cheap Chinese knockoffs that don't actually work. One side benefit: It makes a great conversation starter at a bar! Just walk up to that cute guy or girl and I'll bet you a drink that they will want to guess their BAC.
customer_reviews.author: Be Strong Believe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect so far
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate. I’ve had two older versions that read different results over and over. This version is consistent. Worth the extra money so far. Over time i’ve developed a science of metabolism. One hour per drink +2 hours added if you eat something afterwards. So if you drink 8 give it 10 hours if you eat. If you don’t it’s longer. I can guess my BAC the next morning and this one was right on. And the diminishing rate was perfect. .03 per hour the next morning. Never jumped all over the place like previous version. Well worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: steve stratton

customer_reviews.title: Save the money
customer_reviews.text: Extremely inaccurate after a week. Would not recommend. Its fun to have at the bar, but like i said - its almost never correct and always spews random reads. (And yes its being used properly)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany S

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly accurate!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my friend who drinks a little much... the first time the tried it the didn’t believe it was accurate because they blew pretty high, I tried and and blew a perfect zero with no alcohol. This works! I’ve had several friends ask for the link as well! The set up is kind of confusing because there is only one button. But once you get over the set up it’s really easy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I like the unit itself but it proved to not be as accurate as I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: I tested this unit against a handheld "brand name" intoxilyzer which I know was recently calibrated. This BACtrack unit constantly tested .02 BAC higher. That may be a legal decision they made to keep people from riding right on the legal limit. Regardless of the reason I wanted a unit I could trust out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Accurate results!
customer_reviews.text: Results can be displayed on the device or through the app. I like that when using the app, you are given the option to guess your bac before blowing. I find that in time you get better at guessing accurately and are more self aware of your level of sobriety prior to operating a vehicle. Be sure to follow the suggested wait times before blowing to ensure the accuracy of the sensor is maintained. Passing it around like a party favor will mess up the sensor over time causing erroneous results. Tell your friends to get their own! It's worth it
customer_reviews.author: Clucia79

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: There isn't anything bad to say about it. A friend showed me his that he uses before he starts his truck. ( lot's of DUI's.) So this was his pre test. Stop drinking ten mins before taking the test, or it will read much higher.
customer_reviews.author: Luc

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent.... wouldn’t trust it.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at first.... but pretty sure it isn’t accurate and after about 50 uses ( which goes quickly because it’s fun to try and track how you feel and your alcohol level) it started reading an error code.... even changed the batteries. Ransomly works on and off but not sure I will trust it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen King

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should, Retired Police officer
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it a couple of times and it seems to be pretty accurate. I will say it has proven durable in the short time I have owned it. It was in a box that also had animal hormones. A bear ripped all the boxes open and it crushed this box. The device still works like a charm, hope it is a Lucky Charm! The only missing package, you guessed it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Oconnor

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING
customer_reviews.text: Kept giving me an error message. Tried blowing more slowly, tried it 5 times. not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Perez

customer_reviews.title: Broken Upon Arrival
customer_reviews.text: It turned on and it seemed to work, then after about 20 seconds the LED screen stopped working. I read through the instructions and tried everything suggested (including holding the button for 7 seconds to active "stand-alone mode") however nothing worked. I ended up returning the product for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno P

customer_reviews.title: Price should be lower
customer_reviews.text: That is good for check your drunk status but that is to far from pro! For me APP is so bad. I buy only to see how is work, because in my country is limit of alcohol 0% and if i drink one beer i have prob if police catch me :D
customer_reviews.author: Darko

customer_reviews.title: Has never worked
customer_reviews.text: This item has not worked once since I bought it. I couldn’t be more disappointed. I thought maybe it was not being used properly. $69.00. Out the window
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy and Fun to Use
customer_reviews.text: I have no way to know if it's accurate but if you're using it to know if you should drive then I would trust it. I use it with friends just to have some laughs. The phone app makes it easy to share the results and it fits in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Podany

customer_reviews.title: Blow from lungs and wait 15 minutes after taking a drink!
customer_reviews.text: This works very well and seems pretty accurate. Don't fill up your mouth with air when you blow into it. Blow from your lungs to get a more accurate reading. Also, don't use it within like 15 minutes of taking a drink or it will read way higher than your actual BAC. Really great for knowing if you're okay to drive. It can also solve the "Passing out 1 hour into a party" problem that a lot of my friends have. Helps them learn to pace themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & fun (:
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as something fun to use when at home drinking with friends. The accuracy seems fairly precise. It comes with multiple detactable mouth pieces that can be washed which is great when sharing at a gathering. It is very easy to use. Press one button and the screen does the rest. It also comes with a battery which is a game winner for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H

customer_reviews.title: had it on my keychain, fell right off, never even used it once
customer_reviews.text: I had it on my keychain for my car, to use just in case i had a few drinks and wanted to make sure I was good to drive. Well, it fell righit off, the little chain links broke. Hadn't noticed it'll i went to use it. Never got to use it once. 80$ gone,
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Wow , will save me maybe someday a big problem.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and use it anytime i go to dinner and wine. So far .04 it the highest score but my woman friend that drank the same amount was slightly over .08 and was shocked that so could get a DUI on 2 strong drinks.
customer_reviews.author: TazStazs

customer_reviews.title: Buy another one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriends 21st birthday. I thought it was a cute idea, and the fact that it’s on a key chain makes it easy to remember to bring it with you. This thing is not accurate at all though. Based on it saying it’s police grade, I thought it would work. But one second we blew in it and BAC was 0.08%, then one minute later for the same person it was 0.15%.
customer_reviews.author: Janai Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, accurate, and effective
customer_reviews.text: Excellent to have on hand when you're out for a drink or if you're just trying to get a better idea of your tolerance. The app integration is great and provides a quick and easy interface and fairly accurate projections of time to sobriety. We've found the tester to be consistent and reliable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Laith

customer_reviews.title: Wildly Innacurate
customer_reviews.text: Using this device, following the instructions, has yielded varied results. I bought this device to plan safe travels, but don't trust it to give me accurate information. Customer service was no help.
customer_reviews.author: Andy P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Keychain BAC Meter to Watch Your Drinking
customer_reviews.text: It took me 3min to set-up. I took a reading and watched my BAC drop over time and consistent with published literature on metabolism rates. If you choose to have a drink, I think it's a no-brainer to have something like this to measure if you are impaired. It's also very helpful for tracking alcohol consumption if you are quitting or moderating.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work as it should
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be pretty accurate. I leave it in my truck to make sure I'm legal to drive. So far when I know I'm over the limit, it also says I am. I'm sure it's not 100% correct but close enough
customer_reviews.author: Mprete4

customer_reviews.title: Safe estimate
customer_reviews.text: Although I'm not able to test the accuracy, this product is able to give me a safe estimate of my BAC level. I DO NOT RELY on this device. It is nice looking, easy to use, and very portable. Keychain worthy.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Best Tracker of 3 I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: The best BAC tracker I have bought and this is the 3rd I’ve purchased. I have an IID in my car that measures to state specs and this is even more accurate than that. Fantastic a little expensive but definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Joebobhst

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure its just as accurate as police technology... The only time its inconsistant is when you dont follow instructions for waiting between drinks and testing. A friend bought one too and they were both consistant comparing to eachother.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great portable tester
customer_reviews.text: As a person who makes alcohol for a living tasting is part of our daily routine to make sure the quality is right. Even if you aren’t swallowing some will be processed by your body. I used this to make sure I am good to drive at the end of the day. It fits perfectly on my keychain and in my pocket. Accuracy is spot on with my more expensive meter.
customer_reviews.author: Grayson Stewart

customer_reviews.title: UNRELIABLE READINGS
customer_reviews.text: This device is not dependable and gave unreliable results compared to other devices .We wanted to return, but the "return window" had closed. We would be glad to delete this review if you would return or money!
customer_reviews.author: Harold R. Wood

customer_reviews.title: BACTrac May be slipping on this model
customer_reviews.text: First one lasted a year. About 100 blows. Then funked out. At 75.00 no big since has fuel cell. Purchased second one in 2020. Didn’t work from day one. Consuming alcohol and testing after 20 min since last drink it read 0.00 then .045 then .065. After several iterations over next few hours, it was crystal clear I would never trust this wing man. Returned. Too big of a deal to trust a machine that is untrustworthy. Right now I’m thinking 200.00 dollar units may be the only truly dependable alcohol tracker.
customer_reviews.author: David Carson

customer_reviews.title: It’s a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product it is highly in accurate. You can use it 10 times in a row and get 10 different readings. I took 10 different tests in a row and it read everything from .000 to .290.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Silvis

customer_reviews.title: This is a cool little unit but I wish I could gauge the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little unit but I wish I could gauge the accuracy against something else. It seems to show lower results than I would expect. Its difficult for me to get it above .08 even if have drank 6 + beers. If you drink a beer and immediately blow it will show very high like .16 which is expected since alcohol is freshly in your mouth, but if you wait an 1/2 hour after drinking it shows more accurate I guess but I still think it seems low. I would definitely recommend but don't rely on it to heavily. If it shows 0.00 then your good I think which is handy for IID.
customer_reviews.author: adam walden

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: If you are considering this for family, friends or yourself, please buy it. I use this all the time and it’s a lifesaver. Literally. I’ve convinced several other friends to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don’t know how accurate it really is. I do know that it makes a huge difference and is not accurate if you do not wait around 10-15 mins after your last sip of alcohol. It is small and light, so easy to carry around, but the overall quality isn’t worth the money. It seems to me more like a $20 product. So unless you have money to just throw around, I wouldn’t waste $65 on it.
customer_reviews.author: Hkreps

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: very good accuracy, have run numerous tests against factors such as volume, food, time and mouth wash test. Seems to keep a good track of the expected numbers. Fortunately have never had to compare it to the one carried by the officer pulling me over.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Penny

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed and  becaraful
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when this item arrived home on time but guest what ? Item did not work ..did not turn it on and package was unsealed so I not sure lf someone already opened it
customer_reviews.author: superfoxusa

customer_reviews.title: Reads low
customer_reviews.text: Seems to read too low, but is a great and easy-to-use product.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Bigler

customer_reviews.title: Was curious about this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought on a whim to confirm the little that I do drink is well within legal limit (.008) Liked that I could download an app to track this, and am overall satisfied satisfied. I think the unit like CHP uses would likely be more accurate, but it was twice + I was just buying for fun. Will probably buy the S80 Pro model in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It goes from .12 to 0 in 3 mins... something is so wrong with this
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: It gave wildly different results within 30 seconds of testing.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Bhargava

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: Havent' had any issues with it yet. Seems to be pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.author: shasta714

customer_reviews.title: Reliable readings - unsure on accuracy
customer_reviews.text: I want to use this side by side with a breathalyzer I know is 100% accurate. It will give a reliable reading multiple times in a row but my honest opinion is that it records a little lower than actual BAC, though I dont know for sure. Still worth the money and a cool little breathalyzer
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in this item. The only thing that is accurate about it is it’ll blow zeroes if you’ve had nothing to drink. Extremely inaccurate and inconsistent. Save yourself the money and don’t bother buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Kinn

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little thing. by just having it around I drink less because it reminds me of potential trouble. It is very accurate also.
customer_reviews.author: I. Shin

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: A employer who has to question if their employees are drinking... that's why we got one, it worked, needless to say he was fired.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Meck

customer_reviews.title: More a novelty bust still great
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Not sure how accurate but def registers when your drinking
customer_reviews.author: christopher murray

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my fiancee's birthday and he loves using it with his friends! It is a great tool to stay safe, but its also fun to see what level you think you are at versus what you actually are! The accuracy seems very good, and we have not had to replace any batteries and have used it for about 6 months. It is nice that you can use the app or just use the device by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Deutsch

customer_reviews.title: The size is small & discrete!
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine purchased this item after receiving a DWI & swears by it. After friends and I testing it, I can honestly say that it is legitimate! It's a great resource to help monitor when you should stop drinking or how long to wait before you sober up. I love how it is small and discrete. This is a great product that was a huge eye opener as to what a person's legal alcohol tolerance level is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as described in description!! No Bluetooth option!!
customer_reviews.text: DOESNT WORK!!!! Just got it and the app portion part of it doesn't work, won't even open and won't connect to Bluetooth. Not worth the money and false advertising of it doesn't work as described. Had to select A star just submit review otherwise it'd have NO STAR!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin McGarvey

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Blew a .04 and then about 40 seconds later blew a .081 after not drinking for 30 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Gimmick
customer_reviews.text: As a criminal defense and family attorney I was curious if these types of portable devices were reliable for clients—they’re not. Tests skewed after only retrying a few minutes later. I received results far below what I knew my BAC likely was... no human tests at a .07 after 5 mixed drinks over 90 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Palmer

customer_reviews.title: does not work
customer_reviews.text: This is not the product to have that will not work when you need it to. Kept coming up with an error message every time we used it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: read a bunch of reviews wanted something that works and not wishing to throw money away. It has worked reliably.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Gray

customer_reviews.title: App is broken
customer_reviews.text: The app is broken so the premium you pay for Bluetooth capable is worthless. Keeps crashing.
customer_reviews.author: DDR

customer_reviews.title: Don't drink and drive
customer_reviews.text: Keep tabs on your BAC level. I usually use Uber, but in rural areas sometimes you have to drive without that service available. This device let's you know your limit. Believe me, you want to stay below .05 and avoid a DWIA or worse DUI.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually drink before I drive, but if I have a couple of glasses of wine it is really nice to know that I am okay to drive. My friends and I all use it now.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Super light weight and portable
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Perfectly serves my needs for testing my alcohol limits before my friends or I drive home. It’s so small and light weight that it fits in my tiny purse and I don’t even notice it. I’ve just started permanently leaving it in there. It’s a smart product to have especially if you’re driving - and I haven’t found one this light weight and small.
customer_reviews.author: James Gische

customer_reviews.title: ZERO STARS!! COMPLETELY INACCURATE!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is completely inaccurate and should not be trusted under any circumstance!!! I tested it against a police breathalyzer and this device read 0.028 BAC while my actual BAC was 0.16! If I could give ZERO stars I would! Unless you are just purchasing this as a toy, DO NOT buy this product!! Putting your faith in this company could potentially get you arrested or KIlLED!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian B

customer_reviews.title: Unintentional icebreaker
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and screen is easy to read. Not an intended purpose but people always ask about it at social events. It's much more aesthetically pleasing than the cheaper models. I had a small issue and their customer service was very quick to resolve the problem. Back to back testing with another breathalyzer showed that it was consistent.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Only worked once
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after the first night. Said error message every time.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Only worked 2 Months!!!
customer_reviews.text: I felt like this product was very accurate and a great investment but ONLY WORKED FOR 2 MONTHS! A cheaper version that I bought from another vendor is still working and just as accurate. Very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: very accurate
customer_reviews.text: works well and quickly - it is reasonably reliable if anything erring on the side of caution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to have with you at all times!
customer_reviews.text: I love all my Bactrac products and give them as gifts. While I'm not sure if it's as accurate as a law enforcement's breathalyzer would be, there's no doubt that it's a good indicator and if you're going to drink and drive it's always best to check where you're at before you do drive and this will do just that. I won't be without mine!
customer_reviews.author: THN

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working after a couple times used
customer_reviews.text: We only used a couple of times & now it’s not working. Screen says low battery but we’ve changed the batteries with brand new ones and still nothing. Disappointed. We had one similar to this and worked for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dversophx

customer_reviews.title: Very good tester
customer_reviews.text: It’s very easy to use and was affordable and sleek. It’s very accurate most of the time. Overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jaden Harguess

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt work. The app is cool. But the device doesnt show a reading only 0 every time
customer_reviews.author: James J Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Smooth transaction
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Would recommend to anyone. Many ready to order as I let my friends/ Family try to keep them safe!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! For me, it’s mostly a party favor. We use it to tease each other about our tolerance levels. My friends just think it’s so cool, and it is! It seems pretty accurate, and using it is a snap. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Cthoma007

customer_reviews.title: awesome buy !
customer_reviews.text: this small device packs a big punch !!! it’s very easy to use and has a fantastic app that goes with it. i feel much responsible having it on my key chain and the price is well worth avoiding a dui !!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Watkins

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY! broke almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: lasted for 2 uses! for the price of this breathalyzer I would’ve expected more. I wish I had gotten the $15 one that works better than this. I used it twice and on the third time it just stopped working and says “searching app mode” until it turns off. I have changed the batteries multiple times and still nothing. waste of money. wish I could give it 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Braeutigam

customer_reviews.title: FLIMSY KEYCHAIN!
customer_reviews.text: I really did love this product and feel everyone could use one. Except the keychain they use is very thin and breaks easily. My chain broke two times. The first i was lucky enough to be in my car and found the device. The second time the chain broke while I was out an about and the device was lost. Very disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Error every single time
customer_reviews.text: It worked a few times in testing, though it errored more than it worked. Now it only gives an error. We blew softly. We blew steadily. We turned the device all possible directions. It simply doesn't work. I'm returning this and I better get a full refund for this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Xana Winans

customer_reviews.title: It’s not worth it..
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this product but after using it I was so disappointed.. the accuracy is trash.. first it told me .20 then .03 then .07 I had a few drinks and it had to me more than .08 which is equivalent to around 8 beers. If I could, I would’ve never ordered this product and save my money.
customer_reviews.author: America Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I really have no way to prove the accuracy  but I have no reason to doubt it either.
customer_reviews.text: Just a pretty nice option to keep everyone safe and ticket free.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: More expensive doesn’t mean better
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute waste of money. Readings are all over the place and you get an error message 80% of the time when trying to use. Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Holley

customer_reviews.title: Everyone will want to blow in it!
customer_reviews.text: It really gets the attention from a lot of people, but it is very useful to find out who should drive. I love having this product and it fits perfect on my keys!
customer_reviews.author: Kearney, Nebraska

customer_reviews.title: Way cheaper than the alternative
customer_reviews.text: Great to have - keeps you out of trouble - know where you are before you get behind the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: product doesn't work. frequent "error" messages. when it does give a reading they are very inconsistent.
customer_reviews.author: michael hufnagel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anyone in Greek life/college students
customer_reviews.text: Marvelous product. The app has a perfect design that has many features and the multiple mouthpiece package is great if your friend wants to see their BAC. Know your BAC in around 7 seconds. Too bulky to put on your keys but fits great in a pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: It turned on once
customer_reviews.text: I checked battery voltage and polarity. After holding down the button for a long time it turned on once but that was it. I tried a different battery and still would not turn on. I will be returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Joe O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: This broke after only 1 month of use!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This broke after only 2 months of use!!!!!!!! The factory has not replaced it yet.. It says there is a 1 year warranty on it.. I sent it back to the factory a month ago...
customer_reviews.author: Abay Electronics Group

customer_reviews.title: Breathalyzer
customer_reviews.text: My only issue is the first time I dropped it broke. I want to get another one, but probably not for the keychain. I’ll get one I can leave in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Parker

customer_reviews.title: No bluetooth?
customer_reviews.text: It says it has a bluetooth connection? But it doesnt?! And now im in manila? Theres also a prob. You really have to practice blowing at it bec normally it will show you an error and you have to restart again which is not good especially if you are already drunk
customer_reviews.author: Djonald pornel

customer_reviews.title: Great as a gift, works well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my girlfriend as a "stocking stuffer" Christmas present. She really liked it and it seems to be accurate enough for casual use and understanding BAC levels. Connects with the phone very easily and is incredibly user friendly. Highly recommend if interested in a portable breathalyzer!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great product to monitor your alcohol consumption. It’s nice to be sure you are safe to drive or not. Only tricky part with this product is you have to blow at a very steady pace and be sure you keep it consistent. Very nice product and I am glad I purchased. Would 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Bowman

product_meta.title: BACtrack C6 Keychain Breathalyzer | Professional-Grade Accuracy | Optional Smartphone Bluetooth Connectivity To Apple Iphone, google & Samsung Android Devices
feature_bullets: ESTIMATE YOUR ALCOHOL LEVEL WITH PRO-GRADE ACCURACY - Powered by BACtrack's patented BluFire Fuel Cell Sensor, the C6 utilizes the same professional-grade technology trusted by hospitals, clinics, and even law enforcement.
KNOW WHEN YOUR BAC WILL RETURN TO 0.00% - BACtrack's innovative ZeroLine technology estimates the time until your BAC is 0.00%, allowing you to quickly and easily know where you stand.
CALL AN UBER - Remember, the only safe time to drive is when your BACtrack shows 0.00%. Anything above that? You can call an Uber directly from the App.

OPTIONAL BLUETOOTH CONNECTIVITY - "Standalone Mode" delivers your BAC results directly on your C6. "App Mode" wirelessly delivers your BAC results to your smartphone via Bluetooth. Easily switch between modes.

ONE YEAR WARRANTY - BACtrack stands behind every product we manufacture and sell, but if during the first year of operation any unit ceases to function properly, we will repair or replace the defective product at no charge.
